channel.title: Where to meet girls?
channel.description:
Ok, my mate got dumped about a week ago and has been in a depressive spiral all week.
I told him ide find him some new chicks to ease his pain... but i cant for the life of me think of anywhere to go to meet some...
I ussaly find chicks by going to a mates party or just by hanging with a friend who has chick friends.... but i need a new source for my mate, chicks that are strangers.
Best i can come up with is a club, but that just provides skanky disgusting chicks
any other suggestions? im tapped out

item.title: Where to meet girls?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

I also justified it later on in the post... but so fucking what?

You thought her eyes were closed? Such justification.

i posted a picture of myself... what part of that decides that im acting like an idiot?

My bad on this one. I meant to link to the post where you draw a mustauch of yourself. However, majority of your latest posts are plain stupid.

firstly she wasnt disabled, second of all im now single, third of all.... again, so fucking what?

“Problem is, she has a learning disability in the sense that words dont work in her head.” - Squig

and what the fuck is your problem? this was a genuine thread until you showed up and fucked it up. either leave my thread or start actually trying to be a part of it.

You actually manage to annoy me with the repeated stories, attention seeking attitude and your need to appear more aged than everyone else. This opinion is shared by many of the respected members here.

This thread is useless and meaningless. Always was and will remain that way. I don’t even see why you are still here.
